sub_title: Back office employee specialism Securities at Credit Europe Bank N.V.

education.degree_name: Bachelor management outgoing tourism and travel organisation

profile_positions.description:
Credit Europe bank offers their corporate customers a wide range of banking products, including international trade and commodity finance, project finance and working capital loans. Represented in key trading hubs such as the Netherlands, Switzerland and the United Arab Emirates, as well as in raw material exporting and importing countries including, Russia, Turkey and
Ukraine, they are well positioned to finance our customers’ transaction flows across the globe. (www.crediteuropebank.com/the-bank)

the security back office is a small team responsible for all security and Bond related back office activities, mainly:

Settlement
Corporate actions
Escalation of failing trades
Repo's /Reverse repo's
B2B backoffice customer care
settlement related payments

Due to the small size of the team we have a broad knowledge of all security related activities and are expected to quickly adjust to new products or market developments.
profile_positions.title: Back office specialism Securities

profile_positions.description:
KAS BANK N.V. is the European specialist for the safekeeping and administration of securities and high-end risk and reporting services. We focus entirely on wholesale securities services to professionals in the pensions and securities industries. Currently they have over EUR 450 bn Assets under Administration. (www.kasbank.com/AboutUs/Profile)

As an PMO officer my responsibility was to monitor the progress of the outstanding and assign the tasks to the relevant project participants. Assisting the project managers where possible and guard the Prince 2 process.
profile_positions.title: PMO Officer

profile_positions.description:
KAS BANK N.V. is the European specialist for the safekeeping and administration of securities and high-end risk and reporting services. We focus entirely on wholesale securities services to professionals in the pensions and securities industries. Currently they have over EUR 450 bn Assets under Administration. (www.kasbank.com/AboutUs/Profile)

At Fund Accounting I provided portfolio management reports for institutional investments. Including Coverage reports (dekkingsgraarapportages), monthly portfolio reports and compliance reports. I was responsible for my own clients and their first contact for any questions related to these reports.
profile_positions.title: Fund Acounting Institutional Investors

profile_positions.description:
KAS BANK N.V. is the European specialist for the safekeeping and administration of securities and high-end risk and reporting services. We focus entirely on wholesale securities services to professionals in the pensions and securities industries. Currently they have over EUR 450 bn Assets under Administration. (www.kasbank.com/AboutUs/Profile)

As a senior Global fund services we were responsible for the Settlements of Mutual and hedge funds. And all related activities such as account openings, settlement related payments,  reconciliation of securities and cash.
profile_positions.title: Senior Global Fund Services

profile_positions.description:
Kamino Tours is a travelagency for the main touroperators in the Netherlands England Denmark and Germany. using their local knowledge to arrange accomodation transport and Leisure activities for both package and individual tours in Mexico/

During this traineeship I analyzed the companies  the Strenghts, Weaknesses, Opportunities and Threads (SWOT analyses).
Also I participated with the introduction of the new booking program called Tourplan, INputed travel descriptions, booked travel components for individual travelers and made two short product development trips in Mexico and Guatemala.
profile_positions.title: Internship Incoming tourism
